isCollateralSplit().details: Verifies that contract is a collateral split contract

returns._0: true if contract is a collateral split contract

split(address[],address[],uint256,uint25.details: Returns ranged value between 0 and 1 multiplied by 10 ^ 12

params._underlyingEndRoundHints: specify for each oracle round of the end of Live period
params._underlyingStartRoundHints: specify for each oracle round of the start of Live period

returns._split: primary asset class' share of collateral at settlement
returns._underlyingEnds: underlying values in the end of Live period
returns._underlyingStarts: underlying values in the start of Live period

symbol().details: Should be resolved through CollateralSplitRegistry contract

split(address[],address[],uint256,uint25.notice: Calcs primary asset class' share of collateral at settlement.
